content:
Congratulations on taking the next step with Agorapulse!

Yes, you can definitely schedule a demo or a call with the Agorapulse team to get a personalized walkthrough of the platform and address any questions or concerns you may have. Here's how:

**Schedule a Demo:**

1. Go to Agorapulse.com and click on "Schedule a Demo" in the top-right corner.
2. Fill out the demo request form with your name, email address, and a brief message (optional).
3. Choose a date and time that works for you from the available slots.
4. You'll receive a confirmation email with a link to join the demo at the scheduled time.

**Schedule a Call:**

1. Go to Agorapulse.com and click on "Contact Us" in the top-right corner.
2. Fill out the contact form with your name, email address, and a brief message (optional).
3. Select "Schedule a Call" as the reason for contacting Agorapulse.
4. You'll receive a response from the Agorapulse team to schedule a call at a convenient time.

**What to Expect:**

During the demo or call, you can expect a personalized walkthrough of the Agorapulse platform, tailored to your specific needs and questions. The Agorapulse team will:

* Show you how to set up and customize your dashboard
* Walk you through the features and metrics available for each social media platform
* Answer any questions you have about tracking follower growth, engagement rates, and content performance
* Provide tips and best practices for getting the most out of Agorapulse
* Address any concerns or issues you may have with the platform

**Before the Demo or Call:**

To make the most of your demo or call, consider preparing the following:

* A list of questions or topics you'd like to discuss
* Your social media accounts and login credentials (if you'd like the Agorapulse team to set up your accounts during the demo)
* Any specific goals or objectives you have for using Agorapulse

By scheduling a demo or call with the Agorapulse team, you'll get a personalized introduction to the platform and be able to address any questions or concerns you may have. This will help you get started with Agorapulse quickly and effectively.
